benchmark_details.name: AAAR-1.0
benchmark_details.overview: AAAR-1.0 is a benchmark dataset designed to evaluate LLM performance in four fundamental research tasks: Equation Inference, Experiment Design, Paper Weakness assessment, and Review Critique.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To comprehensively assess the LLMsâ€™ capacity on expert-level research tasks.

data.source: Data crawled from peer-reviewed papers accepted by top-tier conferences and ICLR 2023 submissions.
data.size: 993 instances, 1,049 positive equations, 3,147 negative equations, 100 instances for EXPDESIGN
data.annotation: Expert annotation by senior AI researchers

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on model outputs compared against expert-annotated data.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better alignment with expert evaluations for each task.
methodology.validation: Multi-round peer discussion among experts for data quality
